snippet: In an address on Monday, the City Council speaker will highlight her legislative accomplishments and claim that her Democratic mayoral rivals are more talk than action.
abstract: City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn, whose lead in the New York City mayoral race appears to have narrowed after weeks of attacks from her rivals, shifts her approach by fighting attacks in speech; will highlight her legislative accomplishments and claim that her rivals are more talk than action in upcoming address.
lead_paragraph: In an address on Monday, the City Council speaker will highlight her legislative accomplishments and claim that her Democratic mayoral rivals are more talk than action.

headline.main: Quinn, Shifting Approach, Will Fight Attacks in Speech
headline.print_headline: Quinn, Shifting Approach, Will Fight Attacks in Speech
